scripts.text:
DECLARE @RC int
DECLARE @PackageName varchar(500)
DECLARE @BatchRunId int
DECLARE @PackageGUID varchar(250)
DECLARE @ETLType varchar(50)
DECLARE @SSISDBPackageExecutionId int

-- TODO: Set parameter values here.
SET @PackageName = 'TestPackage'
SET @BatchRunId = 100
SET @PackageGUID = 'PackageGUID_100_Test'
SET @ETLType = 'TruncateLoad'
SET @SSISDBPackageExecutionId = 200

EXECUTE @RC = [Audit].[USP_InsertPackageExecutionLog] 
   @PackageName
  ,@BatchRunId
  ,@PackageGUID
  ,@ETLType
  ,@SSISDBPackageExecutionId

select @RC as PackageExecutionLogId
